mood: Defense intelligence briefing meets cinematic documentary. Clinical precision meets geopolitical urgency.

visualStyle.atmosphere: Dark midnight navy backgrounds, blood red accents, off-white text. Classified document aesthetic.
visualStyle.typography: Bold high-contrast serif headlines. Clean monospace for technical specs. Oswald for labels.
visualStyle.effects: Subtle film grain texture, high contrast photography, dramatic spotlight lighting
visualStyle.composition: Full-bleed dark backgrounds with sharp red accent lines. Data tables with military precision.
visualStyle.imageStyle: Satellite imagery aesthetic, classified document style, military briefing visuals
